text: Su Yiran (; November 5, 1918 â€“ June 7, 2021) was a Chinese revolutionist and politician. He was governor of Shandong from 1979 to 1982. He was a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party from 1977 until 1987. He was born in Sichuan, China. Su died on June 7, 2021 in Jinan, China at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2021 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:People from Shandong Category:People from Sichuan
title: Su Yiran
